TopicTitle: [Forum Games] Post your most shocking statistic

Articles.Content:
Salutations!

This game here\'s purpose is to post one fact from the Stats page of your profile that you think will be the most surprising. You can word it other ways, for example:

'I have over 4000 posts.'

or

'I have the most total posts on the forums.'

So I\'ll start.

I have 637 posts in the Roleplaying Archives.

Cheers!

I post less between 11 and 12 than between 10 and 11.

That would be because I have elevenses. ;D
I joined on June 26th ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

![Over9000.gif](http://i301.photobucket.com/albums/nn69/lovy101/Over9000.gif)

Turns out i can\'t rely on my stats at all.

> 
> ![Over9000.gif](http://i301.photobucket.com/albums/nn69/lovy101/Over9000.gif)
> 
> Turns out i can\'t rely on my stats at all.

God damnit Ascen.
Them wonna yer fancy modurater power thangs?
1539 of my posts (1821) are related in some way to the RP forum (both current and archived).
A little under half of my posts have been in the KSP Development forum.

Total Time Spent online:13 days, 12 hours and 50 minutes.

Wut.

> 
> Total Time Spent online:13 days, 12 hours and 50 minutes.
> 
> Wut.

Psssht, please.
27 days, 12 hours and 57 minutes.

> 
> Psssht, please.
> 
> 27 days, 12 hours and 57 minutes.

32 days, 30 minutes bitch.
11pm is the only time I haven\'t written posts...

I have a cool mission with a cool name 8)

If you want a look it is in my sig.
Only time I haven\'t posted was 4 AM. And I am a teen in the US (I sneak to post sometimes)
I post almost 10 post a day.

> 
> Psssht, please.
> 
> 27 days, 12 hours and 57 minutes.

71 days, 22 hours and 6 minutes.

\*cries\*
Despite my long track record on the KSP Forums, I have only spent 19 days, 12 hours, and 26 minutes on this forum.
I write 10.804 post per day now and at max 2 of them have a sense, the rest is spam/OT/wrong etc.

[Newbish question]

h0w d0 view st4ts

[/Newbish question]
pr0f1l3->5h0w 5t4t5 HAHA 8)

First person ever to report a cracker and get a copy of KSP from HarvesteR for free. Happened on my birthday.

This are actually 4 stats: First crack reporter, first copy for free (I\'m still the only one), and first one to report and to get the game on my birthday.
unoffcial stat: Rikrolled most of the RP Board
I never posted in the RP thread.

> 
> I never posted in the RP thread.

 ![:o](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_ohmy.png)

- Never started a poll,

- Never posted in *RP* and *Welcome Aboard,*

- Have started *four* topics that have not been answered *even once.*

So it\'s not like I was purposely withholding or posting to achieve this, or waiting for such a thread to come along, but...

<---

![HlKa8.png](http://i.imgur.com/HlKa8.png)

Also note this image was taken prior to posting. ???
